comments.text:
In particular, canceling from another animation frame callback for the same refresh driver won't work.

roc, do you think this is a stop-ship for the canceling code?  If not, I'd rather wait until the spec discussion about firing order settles down before changing this stuff around more.
comments.author: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.raw_text:
In particular, canceling from another animation frame callback for the same refresh driver won't work.

roc, do you think this is a stop-ship for the canceling code?  If not, I'd rather wait until the spec discussion about firing order settles down before changing this stuff around more.

comments.creator: roc@ocallahan.org
comments.author: roc@ocallahan.org
comments.text:
(In reply to Boris Zbarsky (:bz) from comment #0)
> roc, do you think this is a stop-ship for the canceling code?

No. I don't think authors should be depending on that working anyway.
